name: temperature-app
description: A Node.js application using TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Docker, and Docker Compose is needed. The application efficiently save the contents of a large file (100 MB or more) containing temperature readings in the format city_id, temp, timestamp using task queues. Additionally, a REST API that returns the mean, max, and min temperature of a city.

scripts.migrate: npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate-prod: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate

author: RizwAnsari
